import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; class Profile extends React.Component { state = { products: [] }; // using a componentDidMount here to retrieve my products from my endpoint // this componentDidMount will load the products in when the page loads componentDidMount() { this.getMongoProducts(); } getMongoProducts = () => { const url = "/products"; axios .get(url) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); this.setState({ products: res.data }); }) .catch(err => { console.log("failed--", err); }); }; render() { return (
